title: Team Schema
description: A group of people that work on a project together.

id.description: A UUID identifying the team internally. This field is generated when the data is created.

schemaVersion.description: The schema version used to save this item. In case the data is saved on an older schema version it may not be readable by the latest VMS version and will need to be converted before being used.

description.description: The team's description, in markdown format.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the team was created.

insertedAt.description: The timestamp when the team information was saved for the first time to the VMS. This field is generated when the data is created.
